title: CHANEL font ID
content:
Anybody know what font this is? Both logo and copy.

Thx.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313162937im_/http:/typophile.com/files/99847_ChanelSS_88_122_495lo_5808.jpg)
author: Lubalin

comments.content:
Logo is likely custom.

Copy looks very much like Engravers Gothic:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/engravers-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313162937/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/engravers-gothic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/engravers-gothic/")
